ovdesc.p: This table is used to accept the product/services subscribed by a Customer in a single screen and trigger workflows (using PW) to complete the opening of Accounts and other services subscribed for.

It is possible to specify opening of different kinds of accounts (Savings, Current) in local/foreign currency, fixed deposits and related services such as Internet Banking, Debit Card and Cheque Book issuance from this table.
